20101214020035.000|20101214020037.000|CCO|TO A SPECIFIC AREA WHICH GIVES

20101214020039.000|20101214020041.000|CCO|TO PUT THE FIRE OUT.
20101214020041.000|20101214020043.500|CCO|>> Reporter: SPRINKLER SYSTEMS 
20101214020043.500|20101214020046.000|CCO|AROUND FOR SOME TIME, IT WAS 
20101214020046.000|20101214020048.500|CCO|ONLY AFTER THE FIRST INTERSTATE 
20101214020048.500|20101214020051.000|CCO|FIRE IN 1988 THAT THERE WAS A 
20101214020051.000|20101214020053.000|CCO|MOVE TO HAVE OLDER BUILDINGS 
20101214020053.000|20101214020055.000|CCO|RETROFITTED.
20101214020055.000|20101214020057.000|CCO|BUT IT ONLY REQUIRED COMMERCIAL 
20101214020057.000|20101214020059.000|CCO|BUILDINGS TO UNDERGO THE COSTLY 
20101214020059.000|20101214020101.000|CCO|REN NOVATION.
20101214020101.000|20101214020102.429|CCO|OWNERS OF RESIDENTIAL BUILDINGS 
20101214020102.429|20101214020103.857|CCO|WERE EBB COURAGED TO PLACE 
20101214020103.857|20101214020105.286|CCO|SPRINKLERS IN EACH UNIT, BUT NOT
20101214020105.286|20101214020106.714|CCO|REQUIRED.
20101214020106.714|20101214020108.143|CCO|>> IN A COMMERCIAL BUILDING, YOU
20101214020108.143|20101214020109.571|CCO|CAN MOVE PEOPLE OFF A FLOOR, IN 
20101214020109.571|20101214020111.000|CCO|A RESIDENTIAL BUILDING, YOU HAVE
20101214020111.000|20101214020112.667|CCO|TO MOVE PEOPLE OUT OF THEIR
